programme.desc: Satire about a bumbling Iranian immigrant who wins the green card lottery and moves to Los Angeles to pursue his dream of becoming an American hero and unwittingly becomes embroiled in a conspiracy to start the next world war(n)

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: Boulevard
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as a married man whose long-suppressed sexual identity slowly emerges when he picks up a male hooker and pays him for companionship rather than sex, causing his life of predictable normalcy to unravel(n)

programme.title: The Program
programme.desc: A group of young athletes come together from different worlds in this gritty, action-packed story of Top 10 college football, where talent unites them, competition divides them and their demanding coach stands by them, even when they fall. Stars James Caan and Halle Berry(n)

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck

programme.title: Pretty Persuasion
programme.desc: When high school student Kimberly Joyce accuses her English teacher of sexual harassment, she turns her exclusive Beverly Hills private school, and everything else in her wake, upside down. Hell hath no fury like a teenager scorned

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them

programme.title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen
programme.desc: A legendary Chinese hero, believed dead, returns to Shanghai in disguise and uses nefarious tactics to infiltrate a criminal empire and employs his martial arts skills to seek justice

programme.title: Growing Up and Other Lies
programme.desc: Four best friends decide to recreate the greatest adventure of their lives, and walk the entire length of Manhattan in one last attempt to find the love and adventure from their glory days. Stars Adam Brody and Josh Lawson

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Split Persona
programme.desc: The bond between twin sisters starts to fray when their mother starts showing signs of suicidal depression. Still, they need each other - but have they grown too far apart? Directed by Bradley Rust Gray. Written by Mayraleeh Nelson

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions

programme.title: American Graffiti
programme.desc: Coming of age classic, directed by George Lucas, following four teenagers in the early 60s on their last summer night before college, as they explore drag racing, romance, drive ins and experience America's last age of innocence. Stars Harrison Ford, Richard Dreyfuss and Ron Howard

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars as WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange in this dramatic thriller based on real events. In a quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power, an Internet startup becomes the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Robert De Niro as career criminal Nick Wells, a safecracking specialist who allows himself to be pressured into one more heist by his flamboyant mentor (Marlon Brando) and a brilliant but impatient young thief (Edward Norton). Soon they're embroiled in a complex scheme to steal a priceless relic from a Canadian customs house, but revealed secrets and double-crosses are just around the corner

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought

programme.title: Halloween (2007)
programme.desc: Director Rob Zombie reimagines a horror classic with this box office smash that begins anew the story of deranged serial killer Michael Myers (Tyler Mane) and his reign of homicidal wrath over a sleepy, unsuspecting town. Malcolm McDowell, Brad Dourif, William Forsythe, Udo Kier, Dee Wallace, Danny Trejo and Adrienne Barbeau costar in this terrifying remake

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this unusual psychological thriller as Earl Brooks, a doting husband and father, a successful businessman, and an award-winning philanthropist. Earl is beloved by his family and community, so nobody suspects that he is also a notorious, deranged serial killer who is under pressure from a zealously determined female detective (Demi Moore) and a sleazy photographer (Dane Cook) with evidence of his crimes. Marg Helgenberger and William Hurt costar

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: 65 million years ago, Aladar the iguanodon is separated from his own kind and raised by a clan of lemurs, including the wisecracking Zini and the compassionate Plio. When a meteor shower destroys their home, Aladar and his family follow a herd of dinosaurs heading for the safety of the "nesting grounds." Along the way, Aladar befriends Baylene, an elderly brachiosaur, Eema, an unstoppable styrachosaur, and Neera, a feisty fellow iguanodon. Together, they must stand strong amidst food shortages and threats from predators

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Kathy (Academy Award® winner Rachel Weisz) is an American police officer who takes a job working as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia. Her expectations of helping to rebuild a devastated country are dashed when she uncovers a dangerous reality of corruption, cover-up and intrigue, amid a world of private contractors and multinational diplomatic doubletalk. Directed by Larysa Kondracki, the film also stars Academy Award® winner Vanessa Redgrave, Monica Bellucci and Academy Award® nominee David Strathairn(n)

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford (Breaking Bad) hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam franchise in Las Vegas, featuring comedy veteran Earthquake who teams up with Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb, and Donell Rawlings to deliver a hilarious night of comedy(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: Marlon Wayans stars as Christian Black in a comedy about a millionaire control freak who introduces shy college student Hannah Steele (Kali Hawk) to the world of "romance" after she interviews him for the school newspaper(n)

programme.title: Who's Your Caddy?
programme.desc: Denied membership in an exclusive Hamptons country club, the millionaire rapper C-Note (Antwan Andre Patton) pulls off a clever real estate deal that guarantees him admission but also touches off a war with the club's snobby elite. Jeffrey Jones, Andy Milonakis and Faizon Love costar in this hilarious comedy of golf, rap, and class tension(n)

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan(n)

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar(n)

programme.title: Alonzo Bodden: Historically Incorrect
programme.desc: Alonzo Bodden returns with a comedic look at the historical inaccuracies of the present and past in an all-new stand-up comedy event that exposes the hypocrisy - and hilarity - of modern day culture(n)

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd and Eddie Murphy play two men whose paths were never meant to cross. Aykroyd is the wealthy, fastidious Louis Winthorpe III, an ex­ecutive in one of Philadelphia's leading investment firms. Murphy plays Billy Ray Valentine, who has spent his life in the ghetto surviving on his wits. They find their positions reversed in a scheme set in motion by the greedy, conniving Duke brothers, founders of the Duke and Duke commodity brokerage firm where Winthorpe is a junior partner(n)

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Stars Shirley MacLaine, Jack Black and Matthew McConaughey. Richard Linklater directs(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan(n)

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum)(n)

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. He is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency

programme.title: Showtime Boxing on CBS: Thurman vs. Porter (R)
programme.desc: Knockout artist Keith "One Time" Thurman (26-0, 1 ND, 22 KOs) defends his welterweight belt against "Showtime" Shawn Porter (26-1-1, 16 KOs) in a marquee matchup of elite fighters in their prime. Plus, undefeated super welterweights Jarrett Hurd (17-0, 11 KOs) and Oscar Molina (13-0-1, 10 KOs) battle for contender status. Live from Brooklyn's Barclays Center. REPLAY

programme.title: Mayweather vs. McGregor - Episode 3
programme.desc: In the latest installment of ALL ACCESS, SHOWTIME SPORTS takes you inside the spectacle behind the most anticipated sporting event of the year as legendary undefeated world champion Floyd Mayweather prepares to battle UFC superstar Conor McGregor in an epic match for the ages

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno

programme.title: Survival Island
programme.desc: A shipwreck at sea leaves a wealthy married couple (Billy Zane and Kelly Brook) alive with only each other and a former servant (Juan Pablo di Pace) for companionship - a situation that quickly leads to sexual jealousy and murderous intentions

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: A real-life medical phenomenon forms the basis of this gripping psychological thriller about a young man who is paralyzed on an operating table by anesthesia but totally conscious and able to feel everything his surgeon is doing. Hayden Christensen, Jessica Alba and Terrence Howard star

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: An ambitious ghost writer (Ewan McGregor) is hired to pen the forthcoming autobiography of a controversial former British prime minister (Pierce Brosnan) but uncovers an incendiary secret from his subject's past that indicates a vast global conspiracy is controlling world events. Olivia Williams costars in this tense thriller from director Roman Polanski

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide

programme.title: Unknown Caller
programme.desc: Racing against time, a man must help his family escape their home that has been turned into a time bomb by a phone caller who demands they play his game

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star

programme.title: Godfrey: Regular Black
programme.desc: No-holds barred stand-up comedian Godfrey performs a riotous set in his hometown of Chicago

programme.title: Andrew Santino: Home Field Advantage
programme.desc: Half Mick, half WOP, hard-headed comedian Andrew Santino returns to his Chicago hometown for a stand-up special with the authentic taste of a city made of Italian beef, Old Style and deep dish. Shot at the historic Vic Theater, Santino touches on everything from growing up thinking he was black and a disgust with bachelorette parties, to his bouts with severe acne and male porn stars envy

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh

programme.title: Erik Griffin: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: In his first ever stand-up comedy special, Erik Griffin breaks it down while talking about himself, society as a whole and everything in between

programme.title: Erotic Fashion Show
programme.desc: When an aspiring fashion designer comes to the attention of a major brand, she can't believe her luck and soon a glamorous new world filled with lusts and desires she'd never dreamed of opens up for her

programme.title: The Nasty Show hosted by Artie Lange
programme.desc: In this comedy special, the legendary Artie Lange hosts a line up of the most deranged and hilarious minds in comedy that's not for the faint of heart. Features Mike Wilmot, Mike Ward, Gina Yashere, Luenell, Jimmy Carr and Gilbert Gottfried

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: Documentary charting the raucous history of the infamous spring vacation revelries in Daytona, which started in the early 60s, and by the 1980s led to the arrival of tens of thousands of college students, lured by lust, booze, fun in the sun and eventually, the hope to make it onto MTV

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17

programme.title: The Surface
programme.desc: When a small plane crashes in the unpredictable waters of Lake Michigan and the pilot is pulled from the wreckage by a man stranded aboard a boat, the two men must overcome their differences to fight the harsh elements and make it back to shore

programme.title: Mayweather vs. McGregor - Episode 3
programme.desc: In the latest installment of ALL ACCESS, SHOWTIME SPORTS takes you inside the spectacle behind the most anticipated sporting event of the year as legendary undefeated world champion Floyd Mayweather prepares to battle UFC superstar Conor McGregor in an epic match for the ages(c)

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: On distant planets, a royal messiah has been born who will restore order to the universe, but there are forces that don't want evil to be vanquished!

programme.title: Twelve Monkeys
programme.desc: The year is 2035 and humankind subsists in a desolate world following an event that eradicated 99 percent of the Earth's population, and made the planet's surface uninhabitable. In order to preserve their fate in this new world, survivors must rely on time travel as their last resort. Desperately hoping that the resources of the past might help them reclaim and rebuild the future, a group of scientists living beneath Philadelphia secure a volunteer to embark on an experimental trip back to the year 1996. Bruce Willis and Madeline Stowe star

programme.title: Kill Kane
programme.desc: A family man seeks revenge when his wife and children are murdered by infamous gangsters. Taking matters into his own hands, he pursues vigilante justice on the streets, hunting down those who robbed him of a future

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds stars as the wise-crackin' Bandit whose daring hijinx during an illegal cross-country trip brings on the wrath of a Southern sheriff. Also starring Oscar®-nominee Jackie Gleason and Oscar®-winner Sally Field(n)

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit II
programme.desc: Academy Award®-nominee Burt Reynolds reprises his iconic role in this follow-up to the first movie. It's been a few years since Cletus and the Bandit made their famous 24-hour run to Texas for a few cases of Coors. Bandit is now a washed-up has-been living in the past, until Big Enos and Little Enos make him another offer: transport a live elephant across the country in 24 hours or less. Also starring Academy Award®-winner Sally Field, Dom Deluise, and Jackie Gleason(n)

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit Part 3
programme.desc: Big Enos and Little Enos have opened a seafood restaurant and want to promote it in their usual fashion. The Bandit is unavailable this time, though, so they enlist Cletus. "Trigger" is brought out of retirement, a large fish is strapped to the roof of the car, and the new Bandit is on his way on another wild cross-country run. But where there is the Bandit, there is Sheriff Buford T. Justice(n)

programme.desc: Stand-up comedy special featuring inimitable storyteller Bert Kreisher, who expounds on a series of incredible and hilarious tales - from an unforgettable run-in with a grizzly bear to his legendary travels in Russia(n)

programme.title: Who's Your Caddy?
programme.desc: Denied membership in an exclusive Hamptons country club, the millionaire rapper C-Note (Antwan Andre Patton) pulls off a clever real estate deal that guarantees him admission but also touches off a war with the club's snobby elite. Jeffrey Jones, Andy Milonakis and Faizon Love costar in this hilarious comedy of golf, rap, and class tension

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: 65 million years ago, Aladar the iguanodon is separated from his own kind and raised by a clan of lemurs, including the wisecracking Zini and the compassionate Plio. When a meteor shower destroys their home, Aladar and his family follow a herd of dinosaurs heading for the safety of the "nesting grounds." Along the way, Aladar befriends Baylene, an elderly brachiosaur, Eema, an unstoppable styrachosaur, and Neera, a feisty fellow iguanodon. Together, they must stand strong amidst food shortages and threats from predators

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Iris Rainer Dart, BEACHES chronicles the 30-year oil-and-water friendship between free-spirited Bronx Jew CC Bloom (Bette Midler) and uptight San Francisco WASP Hillary Essex (Barbara Hershey). The two meet as children and are reunited in the 1960s, when CC is a struggling singer and Hillary is trying to break free from her staid upbringing by becoming an activist. The two ladies room together, then fall out when both are attracted to the same man - off-Broadway producer John Pierce (John Heard)

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: A novice con man (Robert Redford) teams up with an acknowledged master (Paul Newman) to avenge the murder of a mutual friend by pulling off the ultimate big con and swindling a fortune from a mobster (Robert Shaw) in director George Roy Hill's Academy Award® winning Best Picture

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: A young schoolgirl (Keke Palmer) from South Central Los Angeles discovers a secret, surprising talent for spelling that promises to take her to the National Spelling Bee, with the help of a depressed English professor (Laurence Fishburne) and despite the opposition of her strict, disciplinarian mother (Angela Bassett). Curtis Armstrong and J.R. Villarreal costar in this critically acclaimed drama

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: Hallie Parker, a hip Californian, and Annie James, a proper London miss (both played by Lindsay Lohan) are identical twins who don't even know each other exist - until they accidentally meet at summer camp. Now they're up to their freckles in schemes and dreams to switch places, get their parents (Dennis Quaid and Natasha Richardson) back together, and have the family they've always wished for

programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect(n)

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor(n)

programme.title: Hard Candy

programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero

programme.title: The Best Offer
programme.desc: From the director of Cinema Paradiso comes this romantic thriller that stars Academy Award® winner Geoffrey Rush as an antique dealer who becomes increasingly obsessed with a reclusive young heiress who asks him to evaluate some family works of art

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change

programme.title: Dangerous Minds
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer stars in this fact-based drama about a former U.S. Marine who takes on a new civilian mission: teacher at a tough inner-city high school. George Dzundza and Courtney B. Vance costar in this hit that features the smash music single "Gangster's Paradise" by Coolio

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments(n)

programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her(n)

programme.title: Tiny Furniture

programme.title: Dreamboat
programme.desc: TV commercials and old movies are the targets for satire in this amusing tale. Clifton Webb, Ginger Rogers, Anne Francis, Jeffrey Hunter, Elsa Lanchester, Fred Clark, Paul Harvey. Directed by Claude Binyon. (repeat)

programme.desc: A model who is serving a prison term for a crime she didn't commit is offered her freedom and immunity by a U.S. attorney if she'll agree to appear as a material witness in the trial of a notorious mobster

programme.title: Once Upon a Honeymoon
programme.desc: In pre-World War II Europe, a radio correspondent falls for a social-climbing stripper who has married an Austrian baron, unaware that he is actually an undercover Nazi agent who is paving Hitler's way to taking over a number of countries on the continent

programme.title: The Long Voyage Home
programme.desc: The lives of the crew who live aboard the freighter Glencairn are followed as they drink, womanize, fight and bond, sometimes searching for ways to cure boredom, and sometimes facing life or death situations

programme.desc: Story of an aging cattle baron and his divorce-minded wife, who walked out on him two years ago without a word of explanation and has been living back East and running in very fancy circles. Producer's cut edition

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: A group of people traveling through Indian country on a stagecoach are pressured by the threat posed by Geronimo and discover which among them can stay cool in a crisis

programme.title: The Train Robbers
programme.desc: (repeat)

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
programme.desc: A senator becomes famous for gunning down a known outlaw, but later, on the day of an old friend's funeral, he reveals the truth about what really happened that fateful day

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: A strapping Irish-American boxer (John Wayne) returns to the old sod to forget a tragic event in his prizefighting past and falls in love with the feisty colleen, the sister of a "big, bellowing bully" who hates him for purchasing property he himself had his eye on

programme.title: The Searchers
programme.desc: When Comanches murder his brother and sister-in-law and kidnap his two nieces, a rootless, bigoted Confederate veteran teams with a young ranch hand and undertakes a perilous five-year quest to find the girls. Niece Debbie as a youngster is played by Lana Wood, while her sister Natalie portrays the older Debbie

programme.title: Rio Bravo
programme.desc: In 1860s Texas, a small-town county sheriff, his cantankerous old deputy, an alcoholic lawman and a young gunslinger try to keep a murderous thug jailed long enough for the U.S. marshal to arrive on the scene. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: They Were Expendable

programme.title: So Big
programme.desc: A Midwestern farm woman falls in love with a Dutch student in a Chicago boarding school following her father's death

programme.title: The Purchase Price
programme.desc: A cafe singer becomes a farmer's mail-order bride

programme.title: Ladies They Talk About

programme.title: Doctor Detroit
programme.desc: After a night of partying, Clifford, a timid professor, is duped into posing as a flamboyant pimp. Balancing his educator life and street life, Clifford must manage four prostitutes and save them from an intimidating mob boss named Mom. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a group of extreme athletes who are using their specialized skills to pull off a series of complex crimes. Remake of the 1991 cult hit of the same name. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes The Homecoming
programme.desc: An Iraq War veteran returns home after a firefight which left him in a coma and took the lives of several civilians. Soon after arriving, he is wracked with guilt and plagued by dreams of a burning man who wants something from him. After being denied treatment for post-traumatic stress disorder, he enlists the help of a psychic to help him understand, and hopefully conquer, his terrifying visions. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Roman Polanski directed this eerie saga about a rare-book buyer (Johnny Depp) who becomes a target of unknown forces when he's asked to find a volume about the Devil. Frank Langella. Liana: Lena Olin. The Girl: Emmanuelle Seigner. Baroness: Barbara Jefford. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: Docudrama about terminally ill New Jersey police officer Laurel Hester, whose 2005 legal battle for the right to pass her pension benefits on to her female life partner became an equal-rights milestone. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: A British ship captain and his crew battle a French vessel during the Napoleonic Wars. Eventually, the pursuit leads the two ships on an adrenaline-charged chase through the distant reaches of the sea. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A member of the future human-resistance movement is teleported back to 1984 L.A. His purpose is to rescue Sarah Connor, the mother of the man who will lead the 21st-century rebels against tyrannical machines, from being killed before she can give birth. Standing in his way is a futuristic cyborg also sent back in time to assassinate the woman. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Claire and Jamie seek to elicit support from his manipulative grandfather, who may have his own interests at heart, while a visiting Colum MacKenzie has other plans. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Power

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: A New York City subway dispatcher draws on his extensive knowledge of the transportation system to thwart a criminal mastermind. Walter Garber is drifting through his daily routine when he receives word that a heavily armed gang of four has hijacked a subway train and taken all of the passengers hostage. Led by cunning thief Ryder, the gunmen will begin executing everyone aboard should the authorities fail to deliver a sizable ransom in just one hour. (cc)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Enticement leads to terror when Lisa, a sexy office temp, forms a dangerous fixation on a successful and happily married asset manager named Derek. As her obsession progresses to stalking, Derek's idyllic marriage and promising career slowly disintegrate, until the once-happy couple and their newborn are forced into hiding as Lisa's wrath threatens to destroy them entirely. (cc)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: Roman soldier Clavius and his partner Lucius are assigned to squelch an uprising in Jerusalem by locating the crucified body of Jesus Christ. But Clavius soon undergoes a crisis of faith when he witnesses miraculous events during their investigation. (cc)

programme.title: Big

programme.desc: In a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, a young Apatosaurus is swept away by a vicious river current and ends up far from home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child along the way. (cc)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael won't let Claire go to a party, but she's not about to take “no” for an answer, so a standoff ensues. Father-daughter trust is its first victim as she plots to go to the party while he plots to catch her. Erica: Rudee Lipscomb. Shante: Cara Mia Wayans. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Lou Rawls guest stars in an episode that takes a lighthearted look at a serious problem: colon cancer. Rawls appears as a singing doctor in a sequence in which Michael “previews” his colonoscopy the night before he has it. Getting him there is not easy. “What is it with men?” Janet fumes. “You take better care of your cars than you do of your bodies.” That doesn't make him bend. What does is the thought of not being there for his kids. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 18)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Nie dane było Gretchen cieszyć się miesiącem miodowym w ramionach swojego męża. Wszyscy obecni w kościele muszą przejść kwarantannę z powodu epidemii. Kaan nie radzi sobie ze sprawowaniem nadzoru

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 19)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Kobieta i dwaj mężczyźni - to sytuacja dobrze znana Gretchen. W domu czeka na nią mąż, w szpitalu - dr Meier. Z każdym wiążą się inne rozterki. Gdyby Haase wiedziała, że poślubiła oszusta, to ułatwiłoby jej podjęcie decyzji. W dodatku pielęgniarka Sabine działa lekarce na nerwy

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 20)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Gretchen marzy o podróży w wehikule czasu, odkąd jej życie zmieniło się w koszmar. Pewna policjantka proponuje lekarce, by została przynętą w prowadzonym przez nią śledztwie, a Marc żałuje chwili słabości i wysyła jej SMS, który łamie jej serce. Haase obmyśla intrygę

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 20)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Gretchen marzy o podróży w wehikule czasu, odkąd jej życie zmieniło się w koszmar. Pewna policjantka proponuje lekarce, by została przynętą w prowadzonym przez nią śledztwie, a Marc żałuje chwili słabości i wysyła jej SMS, który łamie jej serce. Haase obmyśla intrygę

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 21)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Do szpitala trafia pacjent, który prawdopodobnie padł ofiarą eksperymentu medycznego. Prywatne sledztwo Haase ujawia, że w sprawę są zamieszani studenci związani z doktorem Maurice'em. Wspólnie z Hassemann postanawia odkryć prawdę. Próbuje zdobyć dowody dzięki badaniom DNA

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 22)
programme.desc: Doktor Cedric Stier, były kolega Meiera ze szkoły, wnosi do szpitala atmosferę rywalizacji. Żona jednego z pacjentów, Silvi, ma wyrazić zgodę na pobranie organów od męża. Takie postawienie sprawy wywołuje otwartą wojnę między Sitierem a Markiem. W konflikt zostaje uwikłana także Gretchen, która ma osobiste powody, by prezentować określone stanowisko w sprawie. Okazuje się, że lekarka nagle zapragnęła stać się chirurgiem z prawdziwego zdarzenia. Co oznacza opanowanie i pełen profesjonalizm. Tuż przed planowaną operacją na wizerunku chłodnej pani doktor pojawiają się rysy..

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 13)
programme.desc: W przeciwieństwie do Heidi Klum Gretchen nie przepada za rywalizacją. Ma pecha, gdyż doktor Knechtlsdorfer, z którym ubiega się o posadę starszego asystenta, wprost to uwielbia. Lekarz nie cofnie się przed najgorszą podłością, byle tylko zdobyć upragnione stanowisko. Polem bitwy staje przypadek chorego na raka pacjenta. By wzbudzić w sobie wolę walki, Gretchen próbuje przypomnieć sobie traumatyczne zdarzenie ze swojej młodości, przez które unika konfrontacji jak ognia. W jej życiu pojawia się bogacz, który ma ochotę na bliższą znajomość. Będzie się działo!(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 14)
programme.desc: "Z pamiętnika lekarki" powraca! To kolejna odsłona przygód doktor Gretchen Haase, uwikłanej w miłosną relację z dwoma kolegami po fachu. W ośmiu nowych odcinkach lekarka znów będzie starała się trzymać emocje na wodzy oraz walczyć z pokusami ciała i ducha. Czas pokaże, czy spragniona uczuć kobieta znajdzie swoją bratnią duszę, a przy okazji zgubi kilka zbędnych kilogramów. Do szpitala trafia matka Meiera. Cierpi na wrzody żołądka. Gretchen przenosi się w świat fantazji. Snuje rozważania na temat powieści 'Dr. Rogelt' i swojej roli w przedstawionej tam historii miłosnej(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 18)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Nie dane było Gretchen cieszyć się miesiącem miodowym w ramionach swojego męża. Wszyscy obecni w kościele muszą przejść kwarantannę z powodu epidemii. Kaan nie radzi sobie ze sprawowaniem nadzoru

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 19)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Kobieta i dwaj mężczyźni - to sytuacja dobrze znana Gretchen. W domu czeka na nią mąż, w szpitalu - dr Meier. Z każdym wiążą się inne rozterki. Gdyby Haase wiedziała, że poślubiła oszusta, to ułatwiłoby jej podjęcie decyzji. W dodatku pielęgniarka Sabine działa lekarce na nerwy

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 20)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Gretchen marzy o podróży w wehikule czasu, odkąd jej życie zmieniło się w koszmar. Pewna policjantka proponuje lekarce, by została przynętą w prowadzonym przez nią śledztwie, a Marc żałuje chwili słabości i wysyła jej SMS, który łamie jej serce. Haase obmyśla intrygę

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 20)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Gretchen marzy o podróży w wehikule czasu, odkąd jej życie zmieniło się w koszmar. Pewna policjantka proponuje lekarce, by została przynętą w prowadzonym przez nią śledztwie, a Marc żałuje chwili słabości i wysyła jej SMS, który łamie jej serce. Haase obmyśla intrygę

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 21)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Do szpitala trafia pacjent, który prawdopodobnie padł ofiarą eksperymentu medycznego. Prywatne sledztwo Haase ujawia, że w sprawę są zamieszani studenci związani z doktorem Maurice'em. Wspólnie z Hassemann postanawia odkryć prawdę. Próbuje zdobyć dowody dzięki badaniom DNA

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 22)
programme.desc: Doktor Cedric Stier, były kolega Meiera ze szkoły, wnosi do szpitala atmosferę rywalizacji. Żona jednego z pacjentów, Silvi, ma wyrazić zgodę na pobranie organów od męża. Takie postawienie sprawy wywołuje otwartą wojnę między Sitierem a Markiem. W konflikt zostaje uwikłana także Gretchen, która ma osobiste powody, by prezentować określone stanowisko w sprawie. Okazuje się, że lekarka nagle zapragnęła stać się chirurgiem z prawdziwego zdarzenia. Co oznacza opanowanie i pełen profesjonalizm. Tuż przed planowaną operacją na wizerunku chłodnej pani doktor pojawiają się rysy..

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 13)
programme.desc: W przeciwieństwie do Heidi Klum Gretchen nie przepada za rywalizacją. Ma pecha, gdyż doktor Knechtlsdorfer, z którym ubiega się o posadę starszego asystenta, wprost to uwielbia. Lekarz nie cofnie się przed najgorszą podłością, byle tylko zdobyć upragnione stanowisko. Polem bitwy staje przypadek chorego na raka pacjenta. By wzbudzić w sobie wolę walki, Gretchen próbuje przypomnieć sobie traumatyczne zdarzenie ze swojej młodości, przez które unika konfrontacji jak ognia. W jej życiu pojawia się bogacz, który ma ochotę na bliższą znajomość. Będzie się działo!(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 14)
programme.desc: "Z pamiętnika lekarki" powraca! To kolejna odsłona przygód doktor Gretchen Haase, uwikłanej w miłosną relację z dwoma kolegami po fachu. W ośmiu nowych odcinkach lekarka znów będzie starała się trzymać emocje na wodzy oraz walczyć z pokusami ciała i ducha. Czas pokaże, czy spragniona uczuć kobieta znajdzie swoją bratnią duszę, a przy okazji zgubi kilka zbędnych kilogramów. Do szpitala trafia matka Meiera. Cierpi na wrzody żołądka. Gretchen przenosi się w świat fantazji. Snuje rozważania na temat powieści 'Dr. Rogelt' i swojej roli w przedstawionej tam historii miłosnej(n)

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Jas decides to follow in her dad's footsteps and try out for the junior hockey team. Mr Salford was a legendary hockey goalie in his time at the school. When the try-outs are cancelled due to the coach not being available, Mr Salford steps in and offers his services as coach. Mrs Griggs is horrified - she could do without the chaos he inevitably brings with him - but he won't take no for an answer. Jas and her father are really superstitious and when things start going wrong Jas thinks she's jinxed, and then that she's passed on the jinx to her dad. When she's not picked as goalie for the team Jas is actually relieved - it must mean she's still jinxed and hasn't passed on the jinx to her dad. Eventually Jas does need to play in goal, but when she saves a crucial penalty she and her dad are delighted to realise they are not jinxed after all, just accident-prone! Meanwhile, Martha & Ollie get paranoid that Cassie & Maxwell are usurping them. They've taken over their favourite nook in the library and when they turn up to do their regular security check on Mrs Rennison's computer Cassie and Maxwell have already been there and done it. They decide they've got to get their own back and they sabotage a fizzy drinks maker Cassie and Maxwell have created to provide refreshments at the hockey match. They turn up the CO2 dial and everyone gets very burpy! Lily is feeling abandoned by her friends - they all seem too busy to hang out with her. Matt advises her that a big gesture could do the trick. When she unfurls a giant banner during the hockey match declaring her admiration for her friends it's really embarrassing. It does prompt Martha and Ollie to do the right thing, though, and confess to Cassie and Maxwell that they sabotaged their fizzy drinks machine and does inspire Jas to save that crucial penalty

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Jas decides to follow in her dad's footsteps and try out for the junior hockey team. Mr Salford was a legendary hockey goalie in his time at the school. When the try-outs are cancelled due to the coach not being available, Mr Salford steps in and offers his services as coach. Mrs Griggs is horrified - she could do without the chaos he inevitably brings with him - but he won't take no for an answer. Jas and her father are really superstitious and when things start going wrong Jas thinks she's jinxed, and then that she's passed on the jinx to her dad. When she's not picked as goalie for the team Jas is actually relieved - it must mean she's still jinxed and hasn't passed on the jinx to her dad. Eventually Jas does need to play in goal, but when she saves a crucial penalty she and her dad are delighted to realise they are not jinxed after all, just accident-prone! Meanwhile, Martha & Ollie get paranoid that Cassie & Maxwell are usurping them. They've taken over their favourite nook in the library and when they turn up to do their regular security check on Mrs Rennison's computer Cassie and Maxwell have already been there and done it. They decide they've got to get their own back and they sabotage a fizzy drinks maker Cassie and Maxwell have created to provide refreshments at the hockey match. They turn up the CO2 dial and everyone gets very burpy! Lily is feeling abandoned by her friends - they all seem too busy to hang out with her. Matt advises her that a big gesture could do the trick. When she unfurls a giant banner during the hockey match declaring her admiration for her friends it's really embarrassing. It does prompt Martha and Ollie to do the right thing, though, and confess to Cassie and Maxwell that they sabotaged their fizzy drinks machine and does inspire Jas to save that crucial penalty

programme.title: Where in the World
programme.sub-title: Hamza,Truc and Anushka: Truc has a little sleep - at school.
programme.desc: Stories about the everyday lives of ordinary children living in eight different countries around the world. In this programme we visit three children who are all having a very busy day. In Jordan, seven-year-old Hamza is having trouble getting up for school. But will he get there in time? At school in Vietnam, Truc, who's seven, plays lots of games, has a tasty lunch and a little sleep with her friends. And after school in India, six-year-old Anushka learns how to draw patterns on the ground called Rangoli with her aunt. In each film we see that although children live in different countries, may look different and speak different languages, the joys and challenges of childhood are universal
